templates.name: Fixed Term with Optional Renewal
templates.text: This Agreement starts on [Start Date] and continues for [Term Duration]. Renewal (if any) shall occur only with written mutual agreement of both parties at least [X] days before expiry.

templates.name: Mutual Termination with Notice + Cure
templates.text: Either party may terminate this Agreement by giving [30] days’ written notice. For material breach, the non-breaching party shall provide written notice and a cure period of [15] days before termination. Amounts for services completed up to the termination date shall remain payable.

templates.name: Standard Payment Terms with Late Fee Cap
templates.text: Client shall pay invoices within [15] days of receipt. Late payments may attract interest at [X]% per month, subject to a maximum of [Y]% of the invoice value. Any disputed amounts shall be notified within [7] days with reasons.

templates.name: Balanced Indemnity with Cap
templates.text: Each party shall indemnify the other against third-party claims arising from its breach, gross negligence, or wilful misconduct, subject to a liability cap of [Cap Amount]. Indemnity excludes indirect or consequential damages. The indemnified party must provide prompt notice and allow control of defense.

templates.name: Liability Cap + Exclusion of Indirect Damages
templates.text: Total liability of either party under this Agreement shall not exceed fees paid in the [last 6 months]. Neither party shall be liable for indirect, incidental, or consequential damages, except for fraud or wilful misconduct.

templates.name: India Governing Law + Local Courts
templates.text: This Agreement shall be governed by the laws of India. The courts at [City, India] shall have exclusive jurisdiction. Parties may attempt good-faith negotiation for [15] days before litigation.

templates.name: Confidentiality with Duration + Permitted Disclosures
templates.text: Each party shall keep confidential information confidential during the term and for [2] years thereafter. Disclosure is permitted to employees/contractors on a need-to-know basis and as required by law with prior notice where feasible.

templates.name: Background IP + Deliverables IP Split
templates.text: Each party retains ownership of its pre-existing background IP. Deliverables created specifically for Client shall be owned by Client upon full payment, while Vendor retains rights to generic tools, frameworks, and know-how not uniquely created for Client.

templates.name: Prefer NDA + Non-Solicit over Non-Compete
templates.text: Employee shall not disclose confidential information during employment and for [X] years thereafter. Employee shall not solicit Client’s customers or employees for [Y] months after exit. No broad non-compete restriction applies beyond confidentiality and non-solicitation.
